title: Daybreak's Glow
author: Lyra Stone
pages: The sun rises with golden grace, painting the world with a gentle embrace. Warmth aligns with the waking land, and calls forth life with its guiding hand.
Colors blend in the horizon's seam, reflecting dreams of worlds unseen. Blossoms open to greet the light, a chorus of beauty in morning's sight.
Awake, creatures of the morn, as light kisses the fields of corn. Its glow kindles their gentle pace, drawing them into nature's embrace.
For each dawn is a canvas new, as the sky unfurls its vibrant hue. In daybreak's glow we find our way, blessed in the light of a brand-new day.
